title: How wings are attached to the backs of angels = comment les ailes sont attachees au dos des anges
creator_credit: Craig Welch, Marcy Page and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A man’s obsession with control manifests itself in the manipulation of his gadgets and his practice of a science which dissects and reduces. Despite his meticulous nature he is not beyond longing, but has his crimes and fears pushed him beyond redemption? This film provides the viewer with a surreal eleven minute experience.
